com.phunware.core

Class CoreModuleManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.core.CoreModuleManager

  • public final class CoreModuleManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class manages all attached modules. This is also a direct link from the Core to any module.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoreModuleManager()

    • Method Detail

      • attachToCore

        protected void attachToCore(CoreModule pwCoreListener)
        Attach a module to the Core
        Parameters:
        pwCoreListener - Listener from the module to attach

      • onSessionReady

        protected void onSessionReady()
        Tell all CoreModuleListeners that the session is ready to be used.

      • onCoreInitialized

        protected void onCoreInitialized(android.content.Context context,
                                 boolean freshInstall,
                                 boolean appIsUpdated)
        Tell all CoreModuleListeners that the core is initialized updated. Flags are passed in to help identify if an app is starting for the first time or if it is running from an update
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        freshInstall - true if this is a fresh installation of the app, false if not
        appIsUpdated - true if this is the first run after updating an app, false if not

      • onActivityStart

        protected void onActivityStart(android.app.Activity activity)
        Tell all CoreModuleListeners that the onStart method of an Activity is called.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that is starting.

      • onActivityStop

        protected void onActivityStop(android.app.Activity activity)
        Tell all CoreModuleListeners that the onStop method of an Activity is called.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that is stopping.

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(android.content.Context context,
                      android.content.Intent intent)
        Tell all CoreModuleListeners that the CoreReceiver has received a broadcast.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity that is stopping.

      • getInstallModules

        public java.lang.String[] getInstallModules()
        List of modules that are referenced by a project. Use for core analytics.
        Returns:
        List of modules' package name.

      • getInstalledModuleObjectArray

        public CoreModule[] getInstalledModuleObjectArray()
        Get an array of all installed modules as objects.
        Returns:
        CoreModule object array.

      • uninstallModules

        public void uninstallModules()
        This removes any and all modules from the module manager. This should only be used for testing.
